item.title: Comment on Who benefits from working with AI? by sam
item.description:
i don't mean to be dismissive of the research--which is very cool--but i dislike when they state the results in full generality (i.e., "AI improves performance more for people with low baseline ability"). the task in the experiment is being shown photos of people and having to answer whether or not they are above 21 years of age. concealing this and stating the result in generality is good marketing, but not great scientific communication

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/who-benefits-from-working-with-ai.html?commentID=160820754

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/who-benefits-from-working-with-ai.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=who-benefits-from-working-with-ai
